game.name: Shell Increment
game.shortDescription: An active incremental were You Command your Skeleton Pirate crew. Destroy and Loot ships of their precious shells, Buy and Upgrade cannons. Unlock new abilities and Face Powerful Admirals and become the Richest Pirate there is.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An active incremental were You Command your Skeleton Pirate crew. Destroy and Loot ships of their precious shells, Buy and Upgrade cannons. Unlock new abilities and Face Powerful Admirals and become the Richest Pirate there is.
